channel.title: V3.2 the fire cape wont work can anyone plz help!?!?
channel.description: hi this is slink (partyhatman8541) but can anyone plz help me on THE FIRE CAPE? the pickup code is 6570 when i put it it says connection lost then it relogs me and then my server is screwed and i have to reload it when i drop the cape and pick it up it turns into a note item (i forge twhich item it turns into) so can anyone help me make the fire cape work? also pickup 7000+ wont work. is anyone helps thx :D
